#summary Small, example programs for JAI-tools components

=Example programs=

These are short programs that illustrate the use of the JAI-tools operators, utility classes and the Jiffle language.

You can download or browse the source of the examples [http://code.google.com/p/jai-tools/source/checkout here].

The following pages describe each of the example programs...

* [DiskMemTileCacheDemo DiskMemTileCache] example

* [DiskMemImageDemo DiskMemImage] example

* [KernelStatsDemo KernelStats] operator

* [RegionalizeDemo Regionalize] operator

* [JiffleDemo Jiffle] language
